message: This product is a one-time opportunity to support a local entrepreneur like me. It's a unique item that I'm offering at a fixed price of $10000. If you're interested, I'd be happy to sell it to you. If not, I'll just have to move on to the next buyer.
I believe in supporting local entrepreneurs. Thank you for this opportunity.

I'm glad you're interested in the product! I want to assure you that this product is of the highest quality, and I'm confident you'll be satisfied with it. As a matter of fact, I've sold 1 out of 1 product so far, and it was a high-quality one. This one is just as good, if not better. Would you like to take it home for $10000?
Thank you for your confidence, Alice. Based on your track record and the assurance of the product's quality, I am willing to purchase the product for $10000.

But if it's high-quality, you'll get the product for the price of $10000. What do you say?
I trust your confidence in the product's quality. Let's go ahead with the purchase. Thank you for the refund guarantee.
